thread.title: See Pic: Salman Khan-Katrina Kaif's first look of Tiger Zinda Hai
thread.title_full: See Pic: Salman Khan-Katrina Kaif's first look of Tiger Zinda Hai

title: See Pic: Salman Khan-Katrina Kaif's first look of Tiger Zinda Hai
text:
0 
Sallu Bhai has finally killed the surprise. 
Before you jump into speculations, we are here to inform that the Dabangg star has finally shared a glimpse of his picture with Katrina Kaif from Tiger Zinda Hai and the internet can’t help drooling over it. 
Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif's chemistry in the picture seems smoking hot. 
Khan himself made the announcement on Twitter, with a romantic picture and captioned it with “Back together, Tiger Zinda Hai” referring towards his upcoming movie. 
The team of Tiger Zinda Hai has just wrapped their first song. 
‘Dil Diyan Gallan’ is a romantic ballad featuring the lead pair. It has been choreographed by the talented Vaibhavi Merchant. 0 0 See Pic: Salman Khan-Katrina Kaif's first look of Tiger Zinda Hai was posted in entertainment   Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Tiger Zinda Hai, Entertainment, Geo Entertainment, Bollywood, Vaibhavi Merchant, Dabangg.
